text: Ooooooohhh... On the TLC Tip is the debut album by American band TLC. It was released on February 25, 1992 by LaFace Records. The album reached number 14 on the US Billboard 200 chart, number two on the Top Heatseekers, and number three on the Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums. The album shipped 4,000,000 copies in the United States. == Reception == Ken Tucker of Entertainment Weekly gave a positive review on the album. Steve Huey of Allmusic gave a "mixed" review on the album and believed it helped TLC to become more popular. According to Nielsen SoundScan, the album has sold 2,500,000 copies in the United States. It was later certified 4x Platinum by the RIAA. ==Track listing== == References == == Other websites == * * Ooooooohhh...
